1: [a]Praise the Lord! ([b]Hallelujah!) Praise, O servants of the Lord, Praise the name of the Lord.
2: Blessed be the name of the Lord From this time forth and forever.
3: From the rising of the sun to its setting The name of the Lord is to be praised [with awe-inspired reverence].
4: The Lord is high above all nations, And His glory above the heavens.
5: Who is like the Lord our God, Who is enthroned on high,
6: Who humbles Himself to regard The heavens and the earth?
7: He raises the poor out of the dust And lifts the needy from the ash heap,
8: That He may seat them with princes, With the princes of His people.
9: He makes the barren woman live in the house As a joyful mother of children. Praise the Lord! (Hallelujah!)
